The worst Pilot shower I had. Not just because of its so tiny and no place to put stuff. (I had to put the on the floor.) Also, the water is almost dripping. Very poor. Plus hard to control temperature. Very disappointed.

showerReviews.reviewText: Parking lot is a tad sketchy but the store is super nice and clean. No wait at all for a shower and ordered a pizza. Tons of parking though. Maybe get a reserved spot as they are up front.

I stayed here on a reset. It was quiet (for a truck stop). I didn't see anyone loitering or hitting drivers up for cash. I took a good long hot shower in a clean shower room. I really have no complaints. I arrived at 21:30 and there was still surprising a good amount of parking available. I will be back for sure.
Great stop, clean store and bathrooms, good place to rest, snacks to sit down food & showers. Try the wings- good size and hot.
Can Pilot be better than this? I don't think so. Spacious huge parking, clean, 18 clean showers, bright spacious sales area, polite staff, wide range of additional services. A+++

To date I have always felt welcomed and safe when I stop in . If you‚Äôre traveling and looking for the best place nearest you to stop, this is your place . I am weird about where I stop. Has to be clean . Especially the bathrooms. I give ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I loved it. They were Great. showers were great. filled up my truck. Received complimentary free shower. Lots and lots of varieties here. Place to relax in the sofas. Look around. 2 different restaurants. shopping. Play room,bar,The gas ‚Ä¶

All signs should point to Compass! Best shower I‚Äôve EVER had on the road. The staff are ON üî• w/ cleaning across the travel center. Great place to do a 34 or even a quick stop. They have 8 showers (cost $15 unless you have a voucher - but ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Went to wash my hands in the restroom and some guy had his leg hiked up on the counter washing his feet. I don‚Äôt need to see that, get a shower if you need to. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ was ‚Äúok‚Äù service was good, did my laundry washer/dryers work well and are clean. Took a shower and shower was clean and water stayed hot. Also fueled-touch screen pumps which was different but even fuel islands were clean! The store is ‚Ä¶

Thank you Truck Stop owners for providing us Truck drivers with a gem! This is what modern truck stops need to be like! Took a nice shower and enjoyed some food from the grill. I don‚Äôt think they price gauge like other centers too

Today I stopped at this place which I had saved as a favorite because it looked clean and they give you a shower when you put oil in, I went in to take a shower and at the door I bumped into a worker who was going out to smoke, being inside ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Place is nice,  nice shower clean ! People work there is very nice ! Also lot of parking space and well lighted.

‚Ä¶ driver this place puts all the chain truckstops to shame. With a fuel fill up I got a free shower, a free drink or coffee ( includes dunkin ) and a $10 off coupon to use at the restaurant/bar. And the fuel was .30 cents cheaper than the TA ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ The store has a generous selection of supplies along with laundry facilities and shower fir the drivers. There is also a small Bar & Grill to dine in. ‚Ä¶

It's a large truck stop.  The women's rest room is clean.  Also, the shower room was clean.  However, there is no foot wipe mat.  So it's better to bring your own towel.  Also, there is no water for washing hands.  The main valve was closed ‚Ä¶
